item.description:
7/10/09 UPDATE: TRIP IS SOLD OUT!

We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this exciting adventure through the best of California!

The group will travel August 1 - 8, 2009.

You asked for an affordable, exciting and adventurous group tour and we delivered! Get the most out of your budget with this affordable hotel & camping mixed group tour.

Price: $899

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join us as we explore The Best of California on a Budget, including:

  • A tour through the amazing Yosemite National Park
  • A visit to a Giant Sequoia Tree grove to check out the largest trees in the world up close
  • Camping along the shores of Lake Tahoe
  • Wine tasting in the Napa and Sonoma Valleys
  • And we start and end it all at a 4-star hotel in beautiful San Francisco



Places Visited: Group Tour of Yosemite National Park, Lake Tahoe, Napa Valley, Sonoma Valley, San Francisco

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit our website or contact us at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: The Best of California on a Budget - Yosemite, Napa, Tahoe & San Fran - 8 Days
